actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income any compensation received from the Vaccine Injury Compensation Trust Fund.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an exclusion from gross income for amounts received from the Vaccine Injury Compensation Trust Fund as compensation for vaccine-related injury or death.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income any compensation received from the Vaccine Injury Compensation Trust Fund.
